wikipedia_page.main: Charles Andrew Beckett (7 February 1794 – 1838) was an English first-class cricketer associated with Marylebone Cricket Club who was active in the 1810s. He is recorded in two matches, totalling 19 runs with a highest score of 13. He held one catch and took 8 wickets including one return of 4 wickets in an innings.

response: * Charles Beckett (politician) (born 1958), American politician in the Mississippi House of Representatives
